structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS CONCERNING CRIMES AND PUNISHMENTS

law.text: Process on a charge of treason or felony, for a riot or breach of the peace, or upon an escape out of custody, may be executed on Sunday.
law.history: Recompiled as KRS 431.095, 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 234, sec. 62. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4567.
